price: 99.Yallih farmoyta Nabii Mucammadal ﷺ kalah tanim matan, Yallih farmoh gudduysiyya akke waytek, Yalli isin taamoomik taybulleenim kee Qellissaanam inkih siinik yaaxigeh.
arabic: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُونَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
